name: Spring Hotel Bitacora

reviews.text: Just returned from staying at the Bitacora Hotel, (15 july) had two weeks and could have stayed for three. All the reports you read are true about this hotel, great food, very clean, polite and very friendly staff. Located in great position as we had our son and his friend both aged 17 and our daughter and boyfriend aged 18 and 19 so they could visit all the pubs and clubs within a short distance and my wife and i had a quieter time locally visiting bars and restaraunts near the hotel (perfect balance). The one criticism i would aim at the hotel is the ridiculous fiasco of trying to get a sunbed each morning, to stand any chance we had to set our alarm for 7am and then join all the others who had got up even earlier so in the end we didnt bother and went to the beach most days which was much better and only a nice ten minute walk. If you want a great evening out try the HOLE IN THE WALL
reviews.title: Best holiday yet
enjoyed the break
reviews.text: pub which is Irish orientated but whatever nationality you are there is such a great welcoming hospitality and atmosphere that i guarantee you,ll be back for more, plus Fergal Flaherty who sings there each night will keep you well entertained. The people trying to sell time shares were not too much of a problem but we were pestered quite a lot by people trying to sell watches or sun glasses which is all cheap tacky gear. If you have already booked this holiday you will not be dissapointed and can look forward to a nice break. Many thanks to all at the Bitacora for a great holiday.

reviews.title: The Best Hotel Ever!!
reviews.text: Went to this hotel on a recomendation the hotel lived up to every thing to hear about it my only problem was trying to get a sun bed i would go down and there would be none left so be warned you need to be up very early people would put their towels on and then not arrive to use them till 3pm

I have just got back from the Hotel Bitacora once again. That was my seventh time staying there and it was just as good as the rest. The staff are absolutely fantastic and always have time to talk to my children. My children are ages 12 and 8 and they will agree this is the best hotel they could ever visit. They activities are fabulous and no one is ever bored. The food is excellent and even my fussy daughter gets a satisfying meal. It is very clean as always and the cleaners are great people aswell. They greet you all the time and are very friendly. I would recommend this hotel to any one, especially families.
reviews.title: Great Hotel shame about the beds around the pool
Fantastic family hotel
reviews.text: Arrived back in the UK 30th June. Hotel was excellent, food was superb, rooms good size, service excellent, what can you say thats not good about this hotel. Only that they need to do something about the beds around the pool. Not being one to get up at the crack of dawn to 'reserve' a sun bed, you get to the pool at a reasonable time only to find there is no where to sit. I suggest they remove about 100 beds this would at least provide room to walk during the day.
We stayed at the Bitacora Hotel in Tenerife between the 18th July and 2nd August 2006 and had a brilliant holiday (myself, 39 my wife 38, daughter 15 and son 12).
reviews.title: Great Holiday at the Bitacora
Nice Hotel
reviews.text: The hotel was spotlessly clean and extremely well run. The staff were amongst the most helpful and friendly we have experienced. Nothing was too much trouble.

We paid the extra for a superior room and this was well worth the money as we had a pool view room. The "superior" room also included free safe hire, daily pool towels and bathrobes. We booked with Airtours but emailed the hotel directly for the room upgrade and found it to be significantly cheaper.
reviews.title: Best Hotel Ever

reviews.text: The room was very spacious especially as we had four people in it and the balcony was very large. The mini bar was useful and the contents the same price as at the normal hotel bars. Don't miss happy hour in the main bar from 6pm till 7pm (buy one get one free).
reviews.title: perfect for families

reviews.text: The food was excellent at all times with all needs catered for. You were always spoiled for choice! Make sure that you have extra notches on your belt!!
reviews.title: Great holiday good hotel..

likes.liked: — CLean rooms, friendly staff, good food & location
likes.disliked: — Sunbed allocations around the pool, poorly managed.

reviews.title: Can recommend
reviews.text: We stayed in the peak period and were pleased with the hotel and location. The sunbed issue previously mentioned is correct but we found if you were not concerned with being on top of the pool then you could get 4 beds together at 9am. The restaurant was very good and as previously stated there was an excellent choice.

We booked late and had a room overlooking the main entrance. We found deliveries were made in the early hours and this was noisy, but I assume if you were in a pool facing room you would not hear the noise.
reviews.title: FAB

reviews.text: The location is good for local facilities. We would be happy to stay there again.
reviews.title: Wonderful hotel!!

reviews.text: We thought the Bitacora was a lovely hotel the lobby area we thought was very impressive. Our room was spacious and clean. Our room was cleaned daily and clean towels provided. The hotel was very clean throughout even the grounds where the swimming pool and the crazy golf area were cleaned daily. We found the staff to be polite efficient hardworking and friendly.
reviews.title: 7th time returner

reviews.text: The restaurant had a wide variety of very good food, different options each night definately something for everyone and you could eat as much as you wanted. If you are going out for the evening you can have lunch in the hotel instead of evening meal just let them know. We did this a few times, there is not such a wide selection lunch time but the food is still very good.
reviews.title: Worst Hotel I Have Been To!!!!!

reviews.text: just arrived back one week break with hubby after all the good reviews we read i can now see why the same poeple come back time and time again. this was our first visit to tenerife and it won't be our last. I can see the bitacora becoming one of our fave destinations, it is rated 4 star i would say 4 going on 5 the food was excellent cooked perfect, the hotel was immaculatly clean, the room was perfect asked for low floor facing pool area not a problem. the staff i found to be the most helpfull and pleasent ive ever come across even the maids where super freindly and my god do they know how to clean. the pool area was excellent although watching the early morning ritual of towel
reviews.title: first class service you'll love it

reviews.text: placement was funny but more than enough sun beds to go around. the hotel is ideally situated for bars shops and even a 20 minute stroll to los cristianos was easy accessible
reviews.title: Excellent
Fantastic! Again
reviews.text: better than being ripped off by the local taxi company it should cost you 4euros or there about some will charge you 8 to 12 euro's so be carefull and stand your ground, just to finnnish Loro Park is a must they have a new orca show just as good as florida has to offer. On the whole love every minute going back wiyh the kids soon make this a must stay you only get what you pay for.
Great!!
reviews.title: Recommend this Hotel!!!
now friday we come along, Bitacora, for de 5 th time
reviews.text: My wife and I have just returned from one weeks holiday in Tenerife, staying at the Bitacora (26/5/06). Very clean. Good service. Fantastic food! We are now both on diets!

description: The Spring Hotel Bitácora**** situated in the center of Playa de Las Americas and surrounded by a, sub-tropical garden is the perfect family hotel. It is only a short stroll from the shopping centers and entertainment area. A fabulous beach is just few minutes away and also near the golf course Las Americas (1 km).
